ADSL.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a system that makes it possible for information such as video images to be sent to computers through telephone wires at a very high speed
ADSL.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: asymmetric digital subscriber line; a system that makes it possible for large amounts of digital information to be sent to computers through ordinary telephone lines at very high speed
ADSL.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The company offers high-speed ADSL internet access at reasonable rates.
